text: The 2012 Wimbledon Championships are described below in detail, in the form of day-by-day summaries. ==Day-by-day summaries== ===Day 1 (25 June)=== * Seeds out: ** Gentlemen' Singles: Tomáš Berdych [6], John Isner [11], Andreas Seppi [23], Marcel Granollers [24] ** Ladies' Singles: Flavia Pennetta [16], Jelena Janković [18], Daniela Hantuchová [27], Monica Niculescu [29] ** Ladies' Doubles: Anabel Medina Garrigues / Arantxa Parra Santonja [12] *Schedule of Play {| class="wikitable collapsible uncollapsed" style="margin:auto;" !
